subject: Tennis
United States Open (Tennis)
lead_paragraph: A 42-year-old lawyer and tennis fan from Long Beach, N.Y., Gary Spitz will begin working his 27th consecutive Open Sunday, a tournament record for ball boys.
snippet: A 42-year-old lawyer and tennis fan from Long Beach, N.Y., Gary Spitz will begin working his 27th consecutive Open Sunday, a tournament record for ball boys.
